docs.title: Test Website
docs.text: Just testing things out, not much to see right now.

docs.title: Work
docs.text:
I work as a Technical Product Manager at Famoco.

Before that, I worked as a Backend Developer and a Technical Team Leader for several years.

docs.title: Education
docs.text: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and a Master's degree in Information and Communication Science and Technology, both from the Université Libre de Bruxelles.

docs.title: Colophon
docs.text: This website is built with Material for MkDocs, and thus indirectly with MkDocs itself.

docs.title: Learning
docs.text:
Currently learning about:

  • Product Thinking and Digital Adoption 📝
  • How to be a dad! 👶

  1. A "now" page is a page to keep track of what I've been up to lately, which helps me avoid stagnating because I feel forced to update it. See nownownow for more information about "now" pages. ↩
